comment.author: 26240997@N04
comment._content: Was born in Klundert (Noord Schans) near Breda , this shot is very special to me for the personal bond with the geography, but , the plane , the dog cart, the typical, "Noord Brabant" landscape,the perspective ... Very Nice !

comment._content: Ohhh - did you really use this dog carts? Awesome. Like in a comic I know from my child-hood.

comment._content:
@Johannes Adriaansen

So, according to you the location of the photo is somewhere in Noord-Brabant, not near Soesterberg as the caption reads?

comment.author: 36584236@N08
comment._content: The picture is taken just north of Venlo. The railway is the former railway Venlo-Straelen-Wesel near wachtpost 66 at the Molenstraat. At the background the distantsignal of the former railway-yard Venlo Oostsingel. The railwaycrossing on the foreground is in the Oude Weg, Have a look at www.historiekaart.nl .
